title: Congressmen Ask DOJ to Investigate Water Utility Hack, Warning It Could Happen Anywhere
description:
Members of Congress asked the U.S. Justice Department to investigate how foreign hackers breached a water authority near Pittsburgh, prompting CISA to warn other water and sewage-treatment utilities that they may be vulnerable.

The post Congressmen Ask DOJ to Investigate Water Utility Hack, Warning It Could Happen Anywhere appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Staples Confirms ‘Cybersecurity Risk’ Disrupting Online Stores
description:
Office supply retail giant confirms security incident disrupted online orders, communications channels and customer service lines.

The post Staples Confirms ‘Cybersecurity Risk’ Disrupting Online Stores appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: In Other News: Utilities Targeted by Hackers, Aerospace Attacks, Killnet Leader Unmasked
description:
Noteworthy stories that might have slipped under the radar: Utilities in US and Europe targeted in attacks, aerospace hacks, and Killnet leader unmasked.

The post In Other News: Utilities Targeted by Hackers, Aerospace Attacks, Killnet Leader Unmasked appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: New ‘Turtle’ macOS Ransomware Analyzed
description:
New Turtle macOS ransomware is not sophisticated but shows that cybercriminals continue to target Apple devices.

The post New ‘Turtle’ macOS Ransomware Analyzed appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: US Sanctions North Korean Cyberespionage Group Kimsuky
description:
The US has announced sanctions against North Korean cyberespionage group Kimsuky over its intelligence gathering activities. 

The post US Sanctions North Korean Cyberespionage Group Kimsuky appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Simple Attack Allowed Extraction of ChatGPT Training Data
description:
Researchers found that a ‘silly’ attack method could have been used to trick ChatGPT into handing over training data.

The post Simple Attack Allowed Extraction of ChatGPT Training Data appeared first on SecurityWeek.
